title: Rocket Lab’s Neutron undergoes design change
summary: New concept art was released on Rocket Lab’s website today, showcasing new design choices for the company’s reusable Neutron rocket. One of...

title: NASA Launches Beta Site; On-Demand Streaming, App Update Coming Soon
summary: NASA is elevating its digital platforms for the benefit of all by revamping its flagship and science websites, adding its first on-demand streaming service, and upgrading the NASA app. With these changes, everyone will have access to a new world of content from the space agency.

title: SpaceX came close to breaking a 56-year rocket record with back-to-back launches
summary: SpaceX on Thursday night came close to breaking a record that’s stood for over half a century, with back-to-back launches that had been set to fly from Florida’s Space Coast.

title: ASI to Tap European Startup to Launch Lunar Regolith Oxygen Extractor Mission
summary:
The Italian Space Agency (ASI) announced July 26 that it had signed an agreement with Politecnico di Milano to begin the development of the agency’s Oxygen Retrieval Asset by Carbothermal-reduction in Lunar Environment (ORACLE) project. The Advanced Space Technologies for Robotics and Astrodynamics (ASTRA) research group at Politecnico di Milano is in the process of […]
The post ASI to Tap European Startup to Launch Lunar Regolith Oxygen Extractor Mission appeared first on European Spaceflight.

title: Starlink may account for up to 40% of SpaceX’s 2023 revenues
